name: Marble Madness (itch) (Captainspacecat)
description:
You control a bunch of marbles and need to get them to their respective gold tiles. The catch is that you can only control one marble at a time... and the ones you don't control have minds of their own >:)

Still a WIP, only the first 4 levels work yet

Arrow keys to move, number keys to switch between marbles.

Gold tiles are the goals, red tiles will kill marbles and end the level!

Code: https://github.com/CaptainSpaceCat/Marble-Madness
